mapper.insert: INSERT INTO giftycon (gNum, userId, gSubject, gRegdate, gExpdate, gHitCount, gPrice, gContent, gStatus, gUpdate_date, gSoldDate, gcNum, gIsProposable) VALUES (#{gNum}, #{userId}, #{gSubject}, SYSDATE, #{gExpdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{gPrice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gUpdate_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gSoldDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gcNum}, #{gIsProposable, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO giftyImg (gImgNum, gImgSaveFileName, gNum) VALUES (giftyImg_seq.NEXTVAL, #{gImgSaveFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gNum})
mapper.select: SELECT gNum, gSubject, gPrice, gContent, gStatus, m.userNickName, g.userId, TO_CHAR(g.gRegdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') gRegdate, gcNum, gHitCount, TO_CHAR(g.gExpdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') gExpdate FROM giftycon g JOIN member m ON g.userId = m.userId WHERE gNum = #{gNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE giftycon SET gHitCount = gHitCount+1 WHERE gNum = #{gNum}

UPDATE giftycon SET gSubject=#{gSubject}, gExpdate=#{gExpdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gPrice=#{gPrice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gContent=#{gContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gStatus=#{gStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gcNum=#{gcNum}, gIsProposable=#{gIsProposable, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE gNum = #{gNum} AND userId = #{userId}
